DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Tramadol/APAP Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: To compare relative bioavailability Kali 's Tramadol/APAP 37.5mg/325mg Ortho-McNeil 's Ultracet tablets 37.5mg/325mg
DOC.criteria: Healthy Males females 18 45 year age inclusive Informed nature study give write informed consent . Have body weight within 15 % appropriate range define 1983 Metropolitan Life Company table weigh least 100lbs . Hypersensitivity Tramadol/ Acetaminophen , opioids morphine codeine , related compound , history seizure . Any history clinical condition might affect drug absorption , metabolism excretion . Recent history ( within one year ) mental illness , drug illness , drug abuse alcoholism . Donation great 500mL blood past 4 week prior study dose difficulty donate blood . Received investigational drug within 4 week prior study dose . Currently take prescription medication , except oral contraceptive , within 7days prior study dose overthecounter medication within 3 day study dose . This prohibition include vitamin herbal preparation take nutritional supplement nontherapeutic indication judge physician . Tobacco use ( > 5 cigarette per day ) 3 month prior study dose . If female , subject lactate positive pregnancy test screen prior two treatment period . Females child bear potential must use medically acceptable method contraception throughout entire study period one week study complete . Medically acceptable method contraception may use subject and/or partner : oral contraceptive , progestin injection implant , condom spermicide , diaphragm spermicide , IUD , vaginal spermicidal suppository , surgical sterilization partner ( ) abstinence . female take oral contraceptive must take consistently least three month prior receive study medication .
